title: Keeper Relationship Tracker
description: The Keeper Relationship Tracker can track three dates: when you and your partner met, when you entered a relationship, and when you got married. You can enable a cute widget for your phone home screen or a complication for your Apple Watch which shows how long you've been together, and it can be customized with your favorite picture together. If you enable notifications, it can send reminders on the day of your anniversary, or other fun dates, like 1000 days together. Let's celebrate love!
